boardgame.name: Argent: The Consortium
boardgame.description: The time has come for the selection of a new Chancellor at Argent University of Magic, and you are among the likely candidates for the job. Gather your apprentices, ready your spellbook, and build your influence, while secretly discovering and competing over the votes of a limited Consortium of influential board members. Only the one who is able to fulfill the most criteria will be claim the title of most influential mage in the World of Indines!_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Argent: The Consortium is a cutthroat worker-placement/engine-building game of manipulation and secrecy in which the criteria for victory are secret and the capabilities of your opponents are constantly changing. You'll need to outwit the other candidates, use your spells at the right moment, and choose the correct apprentices to manage your plan._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Argent: The Consortium is a European-style game that minimizes luck and focuses on player interaction and strong core mechanisms that allow new strategies to emerge each time you play._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;The designer keeps an updated Official Errata/Typo/FAQ thread on BGG._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;

Level 99 Games (L99AR001) The time has come for the selection of a new Chancellor at Argent University of Magic, and you are among the likely candidates for the job. Gather your apprentices, ready your spell book, and build your influence, while secretly discovering and competing over the votes of a limited Consortium of influential board members. To become a candidate for Chancellorship and muster your apprentices to gather resources and followers. Research to master more and more powerful spells that you can use to sabotage your rival candidates and their plans! Learn the true motives of the secret Consortium, and become elected the new Chancellor of the University and be claim the title of most influential mage in the World of Indines! Argent: The Consortium is a cutthroat worker-placement / engine building game where the criteria for victory are secret and the capabilities of your opponents are constantly changing. You_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;ll need to outwit the other candidates, use your spells at the right moment, and choose the correct apprentices to manage your plan.

Make an offer for them when you inquire about Argent and I will include them at a fair price. Shipping will likely be 15 dollars depending on the weight and distance. I use USPS. If you want it sent by other means let me know. Shipping worldwide will likely cost more. You will have to be patient for me to get a quote.

THIS HAS A LOT OF EXTRA STUFF, READ THE WHOLE NOTE... It_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s the Kickstarter Version and Includes: - Base Game (Played once) - Mancers of the University expansion (NEW in Shrink) - Summer Break min-expansion (NEW in Shrink) - Argent: Promo Pack #1 - Argent: Hall Monitor It also includes: - Go7 Gaming Insert fully assembled, check here: http://go7gaming.com/product/insert-for-argent-the-consortium/ (The cost of the Insert is around €20, not including shipping) - 7 sets of Bases (each with 7 bases, so a total of 49 bases) in the 7 different colors that makes it much easier to at a glance see to whom each mage on the table belongs, you can see the Bases here: https://boardgamegeek.com/article/22335734#22335734 and https://www.shapeways.com/shops/pmg?section=Argent%3A+The+Consortium_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;s=0 (The cost of these bases is around €70) -------------------------------- Will only accept Bank Transfer or Paypal Will Ship Worldwide with shipping costs payed by the buyer. Shipping from Europe so buyers from outside of the EU should know there_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s a high possibility of Custom Taxes. I have many games in the Marketplace so check them out to see if you have interest in more than one, you can probably make some savings on shipping. Since this will be an heavy package (don_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;t know for sure the weight until I box it up) the Shipping Costs to European Countries should be: 2001 grams to 3000 grams = 29.10€ 3001 grams to 4000 grams = 30.25€ 4001 grams to 5001 grams = 33€ 5001 grams to 6000 grams = 36.90€ 6001 grams to 7000 grams = 38€ 7001 grams to 8000 grams = 40.50€ 8001 grams to 9000 grams = 43€ 9001 grams to 10000 grams = 45.5€ There can be bigger weight categories if needed If you are from outside of the EU please contact with your location so I can get a Shipping Quote from the Postal Service
